events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position successfully and will now review it.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a software engineering candidate.
A technical recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be in touch regarding the next steps.
The initial screening interview has been completed and you showed strong foundational knowledge.
Thank you for promptly responding to our interview invitation and confirming your availability.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 10 AM via video conference.
You completed the technical interview demonstrating excellent problem-solving and coding skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 3 PM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and you expressed strong interest in joining our engineering team.
We have extended a formal job offer to you for the Software Engineer role, including salary and benefits details.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about remote work options.
Congratulations! You have accepted our job offer and are excited to start your career with us.
Your onboarding process has started, including account setup, training schedules, and introduction to the engineering team.
All hiring procedures are complete, and welcome officially to our engineering department.
